Module wineshop.client
Package wineshop.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
wineshop.client.Client
public class Client extends Object
Class for connection and communication with the server sockets
Author:
Mirko Piazza, Camilla Franceschini

      Try login by a User
      Parameters:
      user - The username of the User
      pwd - The password of the User
      employee - True if the User is an Employee, false if the User is a Customer
      Returns:
